ns0:query.ns4:Query: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"> <entity name="contact"> <attribute name="fullname" /> <attribute name="telephone1" /> <attribute name="contactid" /> <attribute name="familystatuscode" /> <attribute name="lastname" /> <attribute name="gendercode" /> <attribute name="firstname" /> <attribute name="transactioncurrencyid" /> <attribute name="createdon" /> <attribute name="birthdate" /> <attribute name="jobtitle" /> <attribute name="emailaddress1" /> <order attribute="fullname" descending="false" /> </entity> </fetch>
